title: How Heroku Is ‘Re-Platforming’ Its Platform
author: Heather Joslyn
description: The next generation of Heroku includes Kubernetes OCI, improved Buildpacks and more, said the company’s Betty Junod in this episode of The New Stack Makers.
cntitle: Heroku 如何“重新平台化”其平台
cndescription: The New Stack Makers 节目中，Heroku 公司的 Betty Junod 表示，下一代 Heroku 包括 Kubernetes OCI、改进的 Buildpacks 等。
